entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
